title: Luxury Stay
description: Stunning mansion with 16 bedrooms and lavish amenities for 30 guests.
amenities: Air conditioning, heating, hot water, kitchen, TV, WiFi, free parking, elevator, breakfast, cleaning services, carbon monoxide alarm, fire extinguisher, first aid kit, smoke alarm, dedicated workspace, coffee maker, cooking basics, dining table, dishes and silverware, oven, refrigerator.
nearbyPlaces: Walk to upscale dining, historical monuments, and green spaces.
